DeepPose
Efficient Object Localization with CNNs (2015)

Stacked Hourglass Networks (2016)
Convolutional Pose Machines (2016)
DeepCut: Joint Subset Partition and Labeling for Multi-Person Pose Estimation (CVPR 2016)
